dct_description_sm: Helio-Zincographed by the Survey Division Department of Militia and Defence 1914.
Relief shown by contours and spot heights.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greewich meridian.
Shows railroads, various roads, bridges, fords, dams, various locations (like lighthouses, offices, stations, blacksmiths, etc.), houses, bench marks and altitudes, marshes, woods, waterways.
"Contours determined with Aneroid and Clinometer. based on Lines of Levels. Magnetic Declination, Aug, 1911, at Mc Donald, 11Â°20' W. Surveyed in 1911-12."
dct_creator_sm: Canada, Department of Militia and Defence.
